preReview.title: Gordon acknowledges Newcastle form must improve to seal World Cup spot
preReview.description: After shining for England, Newcastle United's Anthony Gordon will be hoping to make his mark in the Premier League against Brighton.

preReview.title: Gordon reconoce que debe mejorar en Newcastle para asegurar un puesto en el Mundial
preReview.description: Después de brillar para Inglaterra, Anthony Gordon del Newcastle United espera dejar su huella en la Premier League contra Brighton.

preReview.title: Gordon riconosce che la forma del Newcastle deve migliorare per garantirsi un posto al Mondiale
preReview.description: Dopo essersi distinto con l'Inghilterra, Anthony Gordon del Newcastle United spererà di lasciare il segno in Premier League contro il Brighton.

preReview.title: Gordon reconhece que desempenho no Newcastle precisa melhorar para garantir vaga na Copa do Mundo
preReview.description: Após brilhar pela Inglaterra, Anthony Gordon do Newcastle United espera deixar sua marca na Premier League contra o Brighton.

preReview.title: Gordon reconnaît que la forme de Newcastle doit s'améliorer pour décrocher une place en Coupe du Monde
preReview.description: Après avoir brillé pour l'Angleterre, Anthony Gordon de Newcastle United espère laisser sa marque en Premier League contre Brighton.

preReview.title: Gordon erkennt, dass sich Newcastles Form verbessern muss, um WM-Platz zu sichern
preReview.description: Nach seinen Glanzleistungen für England hofft Anthony Gordon von Newcastle United, einen bleibenden Eindruck in der Premier League gegen Brighton zu hinterlassen.

preReview.title: غوردون يُقرّ بضرورة تحسين أداء نيوكاسل لحجز مكان في كأس العالم
preReview.description: بعد التألق مع إنجلترا، يأمل أنتوني غوردون من نيوكاسل يونايتد أن يترك بصمته في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز ضد برايتون.

preReview.title: Gordon reconhece que forma do Newcastle precisa melhorar para garantir vaga na Copa do Mundo
preReview.description: Depois de brilhar pela Inglaterra, Anthony Gordon do Newcastle United espera deixar sua marca na Premier League contra o Brighton.

QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Newcastle United on Sat, 18 Oct 2025 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 2–1 over Newcastle United on Sat, 18 Oct 2025 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Danny Welbeck was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.1.
Anthony Gordon completed the most dribbles (4) in the match.
Sven Botman completed the most passes (62) in the match.
Nick Woltemade has the least touches (31) of any outfield player.
Carlos Baleba is the most accurate passer (100%) in the match.
Yankuba Minteh won the most duels (9) in the match.
